title: When the enemy team kills your tank

I keep telling people that but they don't get it. It's nice to see another Garen main (Or just someone who knows a lot about him or just the game in general) who understands this
Nothing frustrates me more when people call juggernauts tanks.  At this point I just have an urge to correct it when I see it on the forums.

im here to make the enemy ganks impossible and eat your soul, and im all out of souls

It's that E I hate the most. Thresh has two abilities to stop me from using my Q, but that E just fucks over my entire passive. 

Thresh just straight up counters Sion.

when thresh pulls his ult right where u were chargin
http://i2.img.969g.com/lol/imgx2013/03/26/128_114913_d9fbb.jpg
these are your hopes slipping away
Does his ult stop Sion's?  I don't think it does since he is CC immune in his ult.
The only CC that stops Sion's ult is the Donald Trump kind.

The only thing that stops Sion ult... is killing Sion... or creating terrain and have Sion run into it (Anivia wall/Azir wall/Jarvan ult)
Though avoiding it with mobility like Thresh lantern or Zhonyas (Sion just runs through) is pretty much just as good
Thresh's lantern actually stops Sion's ult last I checked.

"Thresh. Fuck u"
"^u^"
http://tse3.mm.bing.net/th?id=OIP.M876557a72b6d225bd824a35dc51e14aco0&pid=15.1
She isn't immune to CC like Sion and Vi, when she ults?! O_o
Nope it's just a dash.

Well, Vi's is a dash too, but she's still immune to CC while she dashes.

Anyway, good to know, I play Thresh once in a while, I'll try to remember next time I face a Shyv.
You have to time it right. And make sure you flay in the direction she's ulting or her dash might just move a centimeter lol.

Dammit morayshark!!! Stop hooking all the tanks you soul hooker.
